title: Digital Camera 1080P HD 16MP Video Digital Camcorder with 2.4" 180° Flip LCD Screen, 16X Digital Zoom, Loop Recording and 1/4in Screw Mount Vlogging Camera for YouTube Recording
description: Specification: Item Type: Digital Camera Material: Plastic Metal Weight: Approx. 206g/7.27oz Pixels: 16MP (Interpolated) Display: 2.4 inch TFT LCD display Video File Format: AVI Video Resolution: 1920x1080 1280x720 VGA 640x480 Photo File Format: JPG Photo Resolution: 16M(4032x3024) 12M(2560x440) 5M(1920x1080) (1280x720) 2M(640x480) 1M(320x240) Battery: 2xAAA batteries (shipped without batteries) Memory Card: Storage card and high capacity storage card support up to 32GB (not included)  Package List: 1 x Digital Camera  1 x USB Cable  1 x Instruction
